scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && pnpm dev" "cd backend && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && pnpm build && cd ../backend && pnpm build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && pnpm preview" "cd backend && pnpm start"
